title: Condor Rifle Case
features: Padded primary compartment: - accommodates one rifle up to 28 inches long
2 hook and loop straps to secure rifle with padded sleeves for addition barrel protection (one on each end)
Second Compartment is 18" long that is padded with hook & loop panel for hook and loop attachments
Lockable zipper on main and secondary comparment
Padded shoulder strap can be attached at 2 locations with D-rings
description: Condor Outdoor Products, Inc specialize in tactical vest, plate carrier, modular pouches, packs...etc. With over 20 years of experience in the tactical/outdoor gear industry, Condor offers all the essential gear for any mission while saving you money.
